snippet: The Supreme Court seemed to have little trouble concluding that Arkansas police officers who had used deadly force to end a car chase could not be sued by the family of the driver.
abstract: Supreme Court rules that Arkansas police officers who used deadly force to end car chase cannot be sued by family of the driver.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court seemed to have little trouble concluding that Arkansas police officers who had used deadly force to end a car chase could not be sued by the family of the driver.

headline.main: Justices Unite on Key Point in Chase Ending in Fatal Police Shooting
headline.print_headline: Justices Unite on Key Point in Fatal Chase
